vote.title:
Authorize Amendment No. 2 to the Advance Funding Agreement (CSJ No. 0918-47-237, Assistant Listing No. 20.205) between the City of Dallas and the Texas Department of Transportation for the East Wheatland Road Extension Project to (1) replace Attachment C-1 with Attachment C-2, Project Budget; and (2) amend the funding participation, increasing the total estimated cost by $10,278,893.00, from $4,445,390.00 to $14,724,283.00, the federal participation by $7,768,000.00, from $3,400,000.00 to $11,168,000.00, the indirect state cost by $433,543.00, from $191,140.00 to $624,683.00, and the local participation by $2,077,350.00, from $854,250.00 to $2,931,600.00 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City (This item was deferred on October 22, 2025)

*In alignment with Infrastructure Improvements.
vote.description:
